label: UpSet
info: A visualization technique to analyze set-based data. UpSet visualizes set intersections, their properties, and the items (elements) in the dataset.
instructions:
- Drag and drop the data table
 - Specify sets to look at
 - Click [ Run ]

visr.param.order_sets.label: Order sets by size
visr.param.order_sets.info: Order sets by size or keep them in the order of input

visr.param.group_by.label: Group intersections by
visr.param.group_by.info: How the intersections should be grouped

visr.param.order_by.label: Order intersections by
visr.param.order_by.info: How the intersections in the matrix should be ordered by

visr.param.decreasing_freq.label: Order intersection by decreasing frequency
visr.param.decreasing_freq.info: How the intersections should be ordered.

visr.param.decreasing_degree.label: Order intersections by decreasing degree
